trends: There have been 2 other sightings in South Whitley
There were no other sightings in South Whitley on or around August 11th 2013
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailshave been watching this thing dance around for months, this night it seemed brighter and more active than usual. i set my camera, a pentax k-x 12.1 mp with a 135mm lens and a doubler (270 mm total) on the tripod and began shooting in bursts. the entire event lasted approx 9 minutes until i got spooked by strange noises from the woods in the direction of the object. the attached photos are from the last 3 minutes of the sighting. i have many and these are the best\strangest representations. the first photo is at 12:12 a.m. the other four are from 12:13
Object Shape: Circle, Diamond, Disc, Fireball, Flash, Sphere, Star-like
